Articles.Content:
Hi There

I'm currently running KSP v1.0.0.830. 

In career-mode there are no available contracts to select in the Mission Control building. I reinstalled the game twice and made new saves several times, but still there were no contracts.

I'd be very greatful for any kind of adivce.
Hi Reluk5, please see the support stickies, as this is not normal.
